name: VR Hourse Racing Sweetie
description:
This is a casual VR horse racing game, so that you can experience the feeling of galloping galloping by horses by the VR game experience without going to horseback riding in the field. The horses on the field play in the field. Through manipulating the handle, you can control the perspective of the movement direction. Come and experience it!

Operation method:
Move the left handle up/down/left/right button
Turn to the right handle left/right button
Reset position left handle grip key
Menu handle menu key
